info.description: NamSor API v2 : enpoints to process personal names (gender, cultural origin or ethnicity) in all alphabets or languages. Use GET methods for small tests, but prefer POST methods for higher throughput (batch processing of up to 100 names at a time). Need something you can't find here? We have many more features coming soon. Let us know, we'll do our best to add it!
info.title: NamSor API v2

Read the history billing information (invoices paid via Stripe or manually).
Read the billing information (company name, address, phone, vat ID)

BatchFirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY ethnicity from a personal name, given an country of residence.

BatchFirstLastNameGenderedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY gender from a list of personal names.

BatchFirstLastNameOriginedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY origin from a list of personal names.

BatchFirstLastNamePhoneCodedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY country and phone code of personal names+phones.

BatchFirstLastNameUSRaceEthnicityOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY US 'race/ethnicity' from a personal name, given US country of residence and (optionally) a ZIP5 code.

ExpectedClassMetricsOut.description: Simple metrics on a classifier, for a given expected class

FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY ethnicity from a personal name, given an country of residence.

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Origin score value

FirstLastNameGenderedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY gender from a personal name.

genderScale.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Gender Scale M[-1..U..+1]F value

FirstLastNameOriginedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY country of Origin from a personal name.

countryOriginAlt.description: Second best alternative : country of Origin

regionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Origin score value

subRegionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

topRegionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

FirstLastNamePhoneCodedOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY country and phone code from a personal name and phone number.

FirstLastNameUSRaceEthnicityOut.description: Represents the output of inferring the LIKELY US 'race/ethnicity' from a personal name, given US country of residence and (optionally) a ZIP5 code.

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Origin score value

genderScale.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Gender Scale M[-1..U..+1]F value

SourceDetailedMetricsOut.description: Simple metrics on source, with details by classifier.

SourceMetricsOut.description: Simple metrics on a classifier, for a given source
